trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies whether to search the current directory, or the current directory and all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Includes the current directory and all its subdirectories in a search operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This option includes reparse points such as mounted drives and symbolic links in the search.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Includes only the current directory in a search operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
